thing-type.label: M3 meter (DSMR V4.x)
thing-type.description:
This is a m3 meter that complies to the DSMR V4.x specification.

It is not possible for the binding to detect if the m3-meter is a gas or a water meter.
If you now on which M-Bus channel the gas / water meter is connected you can determine the channel from it's descriptor. The descriptor has the following format 'dsmr:m3_v4:[M-Bus channel]_[identifier]:[channelname].
If you don't know the M-Bus channel you can determine this by hand by comparing real meter values vs the reported values.
